meanings: (자리에서) get up, stand up, (formal) rise (up / to one's feet); (누워 있다가 앉다) sit up; (넘어졌다가) pick oneself up; (자리...
(잠자리에서) get up, get out of bed, (formal) rise; (잠에서 깨다) wake up, (literary) awake
occur, (일·사건 등이) happen, take place, come up, arise; (우연히) come about; (전쟁·싸움 등이) break out, erupt
아침의 행동을 나타내는 표현 It's time to get up.
아침의 행동을 나타내는 표현 I guess it's time to get up.
아침의 행동을 나타내는 표현 It's time to get up, huh?
아침의 행동을 나타내는 표현 Can you get up early in the morning?
아침의 행동을 나타내는 표현 Are you an early riser?

meanings.meaning: lightning never strikes (in the same place) twice
it's just/only a matter of time (before…)
